verbs.description: Trump [V: should] be given a little breathing room to see if he can grow the four points into something concrete and substantial .
Trump should [V: be] given a little breathing room to see if he can grow the four points into something concrete and substantial .
[ARG2: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: should] be [V: given] [ARG1: a little breathing room] [ARGM-PRP: to see if he can grow the four points into something concrete and substantial] .
[ARG0: Trump] should be given a little breathing room to [V: see] [ARG1: if he can grow the four points into something concrete and substantial] .
Trump should be given a little breathing room to see if he [V: can] grow the four points into something concrete and substantial .
Trump should be given a little breathing room to see if [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: can] [V: grow] [ARG1: the four points] [ARG4: into something concrete and substantial] .
